TopicTitle: KSP, you've come a long way!

Articles.Content:
I'd like to take a moment to recognize all the Kerbals who have gone before...

Remember when we didn't have ASAS?

Remember when we didn't have steerable fins?

Remember when the only way to mount liquid tanks radially was to use MOAR BOOSTERS?

Remember when the atmosphere cut off abruptly?

Remember when you only had two choices of propulsion?

Remember when Kerbin was the only place you could go?

.17 is a fantasic step in the evolution of KSP. Nice work, Squad!

Squad has been doing an excellent job maintaining their rapid pace of development. I'm sincerely jazzed that my favorite game has been getting awesome new features every few months or so. Keep up the good work guys!
I though I was the only one who knew those secrets
